alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 5:11PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain across Lyon, Mineral, Churchill and Pershing counties through 600 PM PDT... At 510 PM PDT, meteorologists were tracking showers and thunderstorms with heavy rainfall across west-central Nevada. These showers and thunderstorms will affect areas east of Alternate US 95 and south of Interstate 80. These showers and thunderstorms are moving north at 20 to 30 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall with rates up to 1 inch per hour, gusty winds to 40 mph, and lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding of low spots and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Lahontan Reservoir, Fernley, Hawthorne, Yerington, Middlegate, Wellington, Silver Springs, Smith, Trinity Junction, Mason, Stagecoach, Wabuska, Hazen, Stillwater, Fort Churchill Station, Walker Lake, and Weed Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Remember to slow down and turn on your headlights in heavy rain.
